  • The Emperor didn't help. For attacking a girl in Petersburg, ex-incognito was arrested

    Detained suspect in attacking an animator girl in the popular tourist location of Petersburg. The incident occurred last year. A man will be arrested until 17 February.

    25.01.2024
  • "Ruskeal Express" barely burned into the depo in Carelia.

  • There was a burnt house on the valhova's cave.

    A village house of 100 metres was laid at night in the Volkhov district of Leningrad province. A body allegedly found by an elderly woman was burned under fire, reporting 47 news to law enforcement agencies.

    25.01.2024
  • Media: At the scene of the Il-76 crash, fragments of a managed missile were found in the Belgorod region

    At the scene of the crash of an IL-76 aircraft in the Belgorod region, elements of ammunition were found. It's supposed to be fragments of an anti-aircrafted missile.

    25.01.2024
  • The former Minister of Defence of the DPD Strelkova was sentenced to four years of colony.

    Moshorsud sentenced the former Minister of Defence of the NPD, Igor Strelkov (Girkin), to four years of imprisonment in the case of calls for extremism. He was also banned for three years from administering Internet sites.

    25.01.2024
  • The bodies of the dead were found in a burnt room in Volhov.

    The five-stage apartment in the bags had two fire calculations in the Volkhov district of Leningrad province. At the scene of the incident, a burnt body and biological remains were found, and 47 news were reported to law enforcement agencies.

    25.01.2024
  • The pumping station collapsed in Orenburg region: two dead, searching for people under the rubble.

    The pump station crashed in Novotroitzka. Three people have been injured, two have died, rescuers are taking out the junks to find the other people.

    25.01.2024
  • In Kremla, the catastrophe of Il-76 was described as a monstrous act in which Ukrainian soldiers were killed.

    The spokesperson for the President of the Russian Federation, Dmitri Peskov, said that the Il-76 crash was a terrible act. Will the prisoners be exchanged in a pause until they know. He called for an investigation to be completed.

    25.01.2024

    Both black boxes of IL-76 are detected, a flight recorder and a voice-writer. They were given to investigators.

    25.01.2024

  • Criminal proceedings have been initiated after a bus on pedestrians in Petersburg. Driver detained

    Criminal proceedings were instituted on the departure of a bus on the sidewalk on the Vasiliev island in Petersburg, resulting in five pedestrians in hospitals. The driver's in custody.

    24.01.2024

A certificate on media registration No. FC 77-39848, issued by the Federal Communications, Information Technology and Mass Communication Supervision Service (Roskover) of 18 May 2010.
When using materials, the hyperlink is mandatory.

47news.ru is an independent Internet publication aimed at providing comprehensive coverage of political and public life in the Leningrad region, economic and investment activities in the region. The sponsors expect that " 47 news " will be a popular and constructive platform for free discussion of developments in the 47th region of Russia.
